code: class  Solution  {   public :   long  long  appealSum ( string  s )  {   long  ans  =  0 ;     int  dp  =  0 ;   vector < int >  lastSeen ( 26 ,  -1 );   for  ( int  i  =  0 ;  i  <  s . length ();  ++ i )  {         const  int  c  =  s [ i ]  -  'a' ;   dp  +=  i  -  lastSeen [ c ];   ans  +=  dp ;   lastSeen [ c ]  =  i ;   }   return  ans ;   }  };
